mapper.select:
select
from sales_receivables where sr_Yn=0 ORDER BY sr_id DESC

select
from sales_receivables where sr_Yn=0 and sr_pc_id=#{srPcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and sr_currentbalance>0 and sr_custom7=0 ORDER BY sr_id DESC

select
from sales_receivables where sr_Yn=0 and sr_custom10=#{srCustom10,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and sr_custom7=1 ORDER BY sr_id DESC
